amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to prohibit the use of any funds for the operation of TV Marti broadcasting to Cuba. \ As amended by the Smith (NJ) amendment (A029), the above was qualified to prohibit funds only when it is known that such funds would be inconsistent with the applicable provision of the March 1995 Office of Cuba Broadcasting Reinventing Plan of the USIA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 24, as amendment No. 40, to prohibit the use of funds for TV Marti broadcasting to Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendment (A028) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
